StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetZipcodes]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID as integer AS
-- Select zipcodes from the organiza.on SELECT ZIP_CODE_ASSIGNMENT.ORGANIZATION_ID, ZIP_CODE_ASSIGNMENT.ZIP_CODE, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.SHORT_NAME FROM ZIP_CODE_ASSIGNMENT, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WHERE ZIP_CODE_ASSIGNMENT.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND ZIP_CODE_ASSIGNMENT.ORGANIZATION_ID = RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_ID ORDER BY ZIP_CODE_ASSIGNMENT.ZIP_CODE
